text: Stanley Baxter (born 24 May 1926) is a Scottish actor and impressionist. He is known for his highly popular British television comedy shows The Stanley Baxter Show, Baxter On..., Time For Baxter, The Stanley Baxter Picture Show, The Stanley Baxter Series and Mr Majeika. ==References== ==Other websites== *Teletronic.co.uk * *Stanley Baxter biography and credits at BFI Screenonline *Parliamo Glasgow audio clip from BBC Radio Scotland Category:1926 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Radio actors Category:Scottish voice actors Category:Scottish comedians Category:Actors from Glasgow
title: Stanley Baxter
